MemberId.description: The unique identifier of the member in which the node is created. Applies only to Hyperledger Fabric.

NodeId.description: The unique identifier of the node.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the node.

NetworkId.description: The unique identifier of the network that the node is in.

AvailabilityZone.description: The Availability Zone in which the node exists. Required for Ethereum nodes.

InstanceType.description: The Amazon Managed Blockchain instance type for the node.

NodeConfiguration.description: Configuration properties of a peer node within a membership.

description:
Creates a node on the specified blockchain network.

Applies to Hyperledger Fabric and Ethereum.

MemberId.description: The unique identifier of the member to which the node belongs. Applies only to Hyperledger Fabric.

NetworkId.description:
The unique identifier of the network for the node.

Ethereum public networks have the following `NetworkId` s:

- `n-ethereum-mainnet`

NodeConfiguration.description: Configuration properties of a peer node.
